title: LATIN FEVER: Bombón Como Ayer | NewsBreak
description:
About this Event


Hoy Como Ayer & Ear Candy present:
Bombón Como Ayer
On Friday April 4th we’re mixing things up with a special one-night Latin Fever collaboration that brings Barcelona’s iconic salsa bar, El Bombón, straight to Little Havana. In the name of salsa and great cocktails, Hoy Como Ayer and El Bombón are joining forces to throw the kind of party that only two cities obsessed with rhythm could pull off.
For this special edition, El Bombón takes over the bar with their signature cocktails, while DJ Vega joins El Gran Cucu on an all-vinyl salsa set, featuring live percussion by El Gato.
For table reservations click here.

title: Latin Dance Classes: Beginner Bachata with Laurel | NewsBreak
description:
About this Event


Back by popular demand! Urban Movement Arts returns to the Free Library of Philadelphia to offer a series of dance classes. For the Spring, we're having Salsa, Bachata, and Reggaeton classes. Our second class is Beginner Bachata with Laurel!
End your day on a high note with this energizing and joyful Bachata class! We'll begin with a warm-up focusing on foundational techniques and basic steps to get you moving confidently. Then, dive straight into dynamic choreography that blends traditional bachata footwork with sensual movements for a unique and expressive style.
This class is open to all levels, so you'll feel supported and challenged whether you're a seasoned dancer or just starting out. We'll wrap up with a group performance of the choreography, celebrating your progress and embracing the joy of dance together.
Elevate your spirit, find your rhythm, and set the tone for an amazing upcoming weekend. Join us and let the music move you!
Time: 6:30 p.m. - 7:30 p.m.
Location: Skyline Room, 4th Floor, Parkway Central Library
Recommendations: Wear loose-fitting/comfy clothes, sneakers, and bring your own water (and a towel if you think you'll need one). We do not have a changing room, and the closest water fountain is on the first floor.
Questions about this event? Contact the Music Department by email at ZXJlZm11cyB8IGZyZWVsaWJyYXJ5ICEgb3Jn or by phone at 215-686-5316.

Also check out other Workshops in Philadelphia, Dance events in Philadelphia, Entertainment events in Philadelphia.
